summary: The 'x²' and '√' buttons are missing on the keyboard layout in the scientific mode
steps: Click on the 'Выбор' button on the menu bar and choose 'Инженерный' mode
expected_result: The  'x²' and '√'  buttons appear after switching to the 'Инженерный' mode
actual_result: The  'x²' and '√'  buttons do not appear after switching to the 'Инженерный' mode
